modName: BGM Glass and Elven Armour and Weapons
summary: This is my attempt to make the Glass and Elven sets nicer while maintaining a neutral theme, that is can be used by a sneaky character or a more flamboyant head first type character.
descriptionHtml:
Bluish-Grey Moonstone Armour and Weapons (BGM AaW)
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Versions
++++++++++++++++++
Both Glass and Elven
++++++++++++++++++++
v03 - Less blue versions of both the elven and glass armour and weapons; *this is already included in Skyrim Weapons and Armor Tweaks and Changes Completed for those that downloaded it
+++++++++++++
Glass
+++++++++++++++++
v02 - All glass weapons complete
v01 - Male and Female Glass Armour and Shield completed
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
Elven
++++++++++++++
v02Tweaked - Made the armour less blue and changed the colour of the sash
v02 - All elven weapons complete
v01 - Male and Female armour and shield completed
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

While I liked how my previous armour and weapon mods turned out, I didnâ€™t like the holy knight feeling I got while using them in game so I searched and found a ring with Bluish-Grey coloured moonstone in it to use as a guide for this set of armour and weapons. 

So far I think think it looks far nicer than the white-yellow moonstone look and looks more practical as well since it does Not look out of place in the night.

These armour textures are all double the vanilla res, and the shield texture is 4 times the vanilla res, i.e. the shield textures are now 2048x2048 instead of 512x512.

+++++++++++++++++++++
Progress
+++++++++++
Glass
+++++
Armour - Complete
Shield - Complete
Weapons - Complete
+++++++++++++
Elven
++++++
Armour - Complete
Shield - Complete
Weapons - Complete
++++++++++++++

Other Mods:
++++++++++++++

For those interested in a complete set of tweaks and changes that I have made to all armor and weapons.
Skyrim Weapons and Armor Tweaks and Changes Completed -
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3793

For those who like the vanilla moonstone colour and want a matching set of Elven and Glass gear.
Moonstone Elven Armour and Weapons - 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=634
MaM Glass Armour and Weapons - 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1408
author: cmdo
